text: Putot-en-Bessin is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune Thue et Mue.Arrêté préfectoral 8 September 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Putot-en-Bessin
